data.title: 4 New Pink Eiga Releases Coming to VOD In September!
meta_keywords: maid in japan orgasm counselor pink eiga s&m hunter begins whore hospital
data.meta_site_name: Rock! Shock! Pop! Forums - Cult Movie DVD And Blu-ray Reviews, Comics Books, Music And More!
data.text:
Pink Eiga just announced 4 new releases coming to their streaming site. No news of DVD releases yet. Details here:

http://pinkeiga.com/VOD/release-dates/

Coming 9/6/12 - Maid In Japan

In fast-paced Tokyo, there are few safe havens for men who are down on their luckâ€¦ But those in the know go to 'The House of Maids', a maid cafe whose waitresses will do anything to bring a smile to their customers' faces.

The smoking-hot Azusa Ayano stars in this sexy, comedic romp, that is guaranteed to bring warm feelings to your heart - and perhaps other places?

Directed by Chise Matoba (aka. Hamano Sachi)

Starring: Azusa Ayano, Reiko Kagami, Kyoko Kazama, and Seiji Nakamitsu

Coming 9/13/12 - The Orgasm Counselor

Sexual dysfunction isn't something you should be ashamed of and it doesn't need little blue pills to fixâ€¦ What you DO need is a little one-on-one coaching.

Enter the Orgasm Counselors, an elite group of scientifically trained, sexual educators who operate out of a Skype-like video conferencing center in Tokyo. Can't keep your jizz in long enough to consummate that budding romance? No problem; after one remote video session with the

Orgasm Counselor you'll be bonking like a pro. Chise Matoba directs this spiritual cousin to her hit film Maid in Japan.

Directed by CHISE MATOBA (aka SACHI HAMANO)

Starring: Sayaka Kitagawa, Kyoko Kagami and Mayuko Sasaki

Coming 9/20/12 - Whore Hospital

We're not going to lie to you, director Chise Matoba makes some pretty damn erotic Pink Eiga. Her films, like Maid in Japan and Orgasm

Counselor, are haiku-like in their story economy, focusing on what's really important: hot women, having hot sex.

At the Whore Hospital, it's a wonderful place for Japanese men to go and heal - because the nurses are addicted to sex! You have a broken leg? Not a problem that a little screwing can't fix! Pneumonia? Yep, a prescription of blow jobs should do the trick. Trust us, after watching this movie, you'll be on the first plane to Japan, to get a check up at the Whore Hospital.

Directed by Chise Matoba (AKA: Sachi Hamano)

Starring: Myu Aso and Kyoko Kazama

Coming 9/27/12 - S&M Hunter Begins

THE LEGEND BEGINS! This prequel to the pink cult hit S&M Hunter tells the origin story of how an average salary man became the world's first S&M superhero! How did he lose his eye? Why is bad girl Meg chasing him in the first place? And why did Maria become a masochist?

Long out of print and hungered for by Pink Eiga fans the world over, Pink Eiga Inc. is proud to release the only true superhero movie that matters in a flooded market of comic book adaptations!

Directed by Shuji Kataoka

Starring: Shiro Shimomoto, Hiromi Saotome, Erika Suzune and Naomi Sugishita

There are age restricted trailers for all four films available here.
